title: Oceans absorb 90% of the heat from climate change — here's why record ocean temps are so harmful
description: Record ocean temperatures cause stronger storms, displace and kill fish populations, stress coral reefs, turbocharge the growth of algal blooms, and more.

title: Federal Judge asks if Elon Musk was trying to 'cozy up' with former President Trump during criminal probe
description: According to the transcript of a legal hearing released Wednesday, a federal judge asked if Elon Musk's Twitter was attempting to "cozy up" to Donald Trump

title: Landing a new job right now could take you nearly 2 months, according to LinkedIn
description: Hiring has slowed from last year’s breakneck pace, but the news isn’t all bad for job seekers, says economist Luke Pardue.

title: Fed officials see 'upside risks' to inflation possibly leading to more rate hikes, minutes show
description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday released minutes from its July 25-26 policy meeting.

title: Amazon adds a new fee for sellers who ship their own packages
description: Amazon is charging a fee for members of its Seller Fulfilled Prime program, where merchants handle shipping but can include the Prime badge on their listing.

title: 'Barbie' beats Batman, becomes Warner Bros.' highest-grossing domestic release
description: "Barbie" has topped $537 million, making it the highest-grossing domestic movie in Warner Bros. Discovery's 100-year history.

title: Google reportedly building A.I. that offers life advice
description: One of Google's AI units, DeepMind, is reportedly using generative AI to develop at least 21 different tools for life advice, planning and tutoring.

title: NATO official admits comments on Ukraine giving up territory to gain membership were a 'mistake'
description: Stian Jenssen was criticized by a Ukrainian presidential advisor for suggesting Ukraine could "give up territory, and get NATO membership in return."

title: iPhone 15 production begins in India as Apple aims to diversify from China: Report
description: Pegatron and a Wistron factory being acquired by the Tata Group will also soon begin assembling the iPhone 15 in India, according to the report.

title: Australia 1-3 England: Lionesses see off co-hosts to set up Spain showdown in their first Women's World Cup final
description: England have made more history, reaching their first Women's World Cup final after beating Australia 3-1 to set up a showdown with Spain on Sunday.

title: UK launches £1 billion fintech fund to compete with Silicon Valley
description: A new U.K. investment fund with up to £1 billion ($1.27 billion) in raised capital has been launched to back growth-stage financial technology companies.

title: As recession fears fade, we may be experiencing a 'richcession' instead — here’s what that means for you
description: Some economists say the country is already experiencing a "richcession," rather than a broad contraction to come later.

title: Tesla makes further price cuts in China, reducing models S and X by $7,400 to $8,500
description: In China, Tesla put the Model X on sale for 754,900 Chinese yuan ($103,444) down from 898,900 yuan. The Model S is being sold for 836,900 versus 808,900 yuan.

title: Vietnamese EV maker VinFast is now worth more than Ford and GM after Nasdaq debut
description: On Tuesday, the Vietnamese electric vehicle maker listed on Nasdaq following the completion of its merger.

title: HKEX first-half net profit rises 31%, CEO is 'quite optimistic' about medium term outlook
description: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing reported a 31% year-on-year rise in net profit for the first six months of the year.

title: China's Tencent misses expectations despite fastest profit rise since late 2021
description: Tencent on Wednesday reported a surge in profit for the second quarter, but missed expectations.

title: Intel scraps $5.4 billion acquisition of Tower Semiconductor after regulators fail to approve deal
description: Intel first announced plans to buy Tower Semiconductor in 2022 for $5.4 billion, but is now terminating the deal saying it failed to get regulatory approval.

title: China may 'miss the 5%' growth target this year as downside risks spread
description: Without more stimulus, China is increasingly likely to miss its growth target of around 5% this year, economists said.

title: UK headline inflation rate drops sharply to 6.8% in July, in line with expectations
description: U.K. inflation continued to cool in July but the core consumer price index increased, posing a potential headache for the Bank of England.

title: A multitrillion-dollar carbon bubble? Climate chief warns world leaders over fossil fuel plans
description: The head of the world's climate science authority says policymakers could overlook a multitrillion-dollar time bomb by pushing ahead with fossil fuel plans.

title: JPMorgan hikes EM default forecast as Country Garden drives China contagion fears
description: JPMorgan expects the China property sector to account for nearly 40% of all high yield default volumes in emerging markets in 2023.

title: Trump stiffed his alleged co-conspirators, whose false claims brought in $250 million
description: Some of former President Donald Trump's alleged co-conspirators were never paid for their work for his campaign, despite a $250 million windfall.

title: 3 unexpected traits of bad bosses and signs of ‘dysfunction,’ according to a workplace expert
description: "All these traits not only seem harmless, but even desired by many employees," said Kevin Legg, who has 20 years of experience in corporate professional learning.

title: Southeast Asia turns to alternative meats as fight against climate change ramps up
description: To limit global warming, the region must lower production of animal proteins and shift to plant-based, cultivated and other alternative sources by 2030.
